name: Yun Lin 0001
content: LIN Yun's Blog Email: lin_yun ~ sjtu DOT edu DOT cn Office: SEIEE Building, No.3, 526A Dr. LIN, Yun (æäº) I am an Associate Professor and the Deputy Head of the Department of Computer Science and Technology, School of Computer Science, Shanghai Jiao Tong University. Before joining SJTU, I was a Research Assistant Professor working with Prof. Dong Jin Song in National University of Singapore. My expertise ranges from automatic programming, explainble AI, and web misinformation (see research profile). A Chinese version of introduction is available here. If you are interested in joining our CoPhi group, please read the advice. News [2025/10/16] Our work "MINES: Explainable Anomaly Detection through Web API Invariant	Inference" is to appear in ICSE'26. Congratulations to Wenjie and Xiwen! [2025/09/26] Our work "Learning Project-wise Subsequent Code Edits via Interleaving Neural-based Induction and Tool-based Deduction" are to appear in ASE'25. Congratulations to Chenyan, Yuhuan, Jiaxin, Binhang, and Bo! [2025/06/16] Our co-supervised FYP student Silas Yeo Shuen Yu and Li Siqi won the OURP (Outstanding Undergraduate Research Prize) in School of Computing, National University of Singapore.
